text: with nearly a million produced the most
popular roadster of all time is the

most in the US know it as the Miata a
name unique to our country and
officially dropped nearly 10 years ago
the mx-5 moniker never gained traction
in America probably because the Miata
made a huge impact on driving
enthusiasts and pop culture when it
debuted in 1989
full disclosure for journalistic
integrity I bought an original year
Miata back in the day brand-new and I

of a car so you might ask Tom how do you
possibly be objective well for one thing
cars changed an awful lot in 26 years
fourth-generation Miatas I mean mx-5s
get four airbags traction and stability
control anti-lock brakes and a structure
that's far more solid and safe than the
first gen the headlights are LED at 2332
pounds this car is 150 pounds lighter
than the outgoing model that's important
since the 2-liter 4-cylinder makes only
155 horsepower
and 148 pound-feet of torque
both the automatic and this legendary

speeds want the push of a Saturn five
rocket
he'll shop elsewhere that old chestnut

seconds is pokey this is so much fun to

balanced it really talks to you
surprising for electric power steering
Miata is like an extension of your body
you'll feel everything the car is doing
and that makes it easy to drive hard the
suspension of this club model with BBS
wheel package is sports car firm but not
jarring the Brembo brakes keep
rambunctious drivers out of trouble
regardless of price the short-throw

reason to learn Mazda has upped the fun
and fuel economy improved by 25% the

no I do not wear a ton of hairspray in
the past Miatas have all had rounded
designs this one is drawn more sharply
the only body panels not made of
aluminum are the doors and windshield
header the body color is welcomed into
the cockpit I find the deep set details
here and here don't match up with the
more subtle lines on the side and front
they call me a sucker for the first jet
car as always the cabin is a cozy place
for two adults the wheel does not adjust
for reach I'll wager those over six feet
will have Headroom issues the seats save
weight by using a stretchy fabric
suspended by a frame much like an Aeron
office chair Mazda's user interfaces
here navigate by knob or touchscreen
it's fairly intuitive the lid uses high
quality material the top is not power
operated doesn't need to be it is
intimate in here there are a few options
for storage and beverages and that's
great since there's no glovebox
even the CD reader is in a clever spot
the good news the trunk is bigger now
the bad news it's still not very large
practicality has never been a strong

light simply put no other car offers

especially at its price point a base car
